mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mc_topic ( topic_id, name, image_url, summary, create_time, read_count ) VALUES ( #{topicId}, #{name}, #{imageUrl}, #{summary}, #{createTime}, #{readCount} )
mapper.select: select topic_id as topicId, name as name, image_url as imageUrl, summary as summary, create_time as createTime, read_count as readCount from mc_topic order by create_time desc limit #{0},#{1}
